boardgame.name: Legend of the Five Rings: Das Kartenspiel
Legend of the Five Rings: The Card Game
Legenda Pięciu Kręgów: Gra karciana
La Légende des Cinq Anneaux: Le jeux de cartes
La Leggenda dei Cinque Anelli: Il Gioco di Carte
La Leyenda de los Cinco Anillos: El Juego de Cartas
boardgame.description: Description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Welcome to the realm of Rokugan: a land of samurai and mystics, mad dragons and divine beings _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; a land where honor is stronger than steel. Here, the clans serve the Emperor and engage in courtly deceptions and power plays, even as they wage war against each other and the evil forces that plague their realm. This is the world of Legend of the Five Rings!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Legend of the Five Rings: The Card Game is a Living Card Game set in the world of Rokugan, the original setting for the Legend of the Five Rings collectible card game. To play a Living Card Game, players create individual decks of cards from a base game with a fixed set of cards; they can then add supplemental card packs to this game world, with each pack also having a fixed set of cards, in order to vary their game experience._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;While the connection of Legend of the Five Rings: The Card Game to Rokugan and the Colonies _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; as well as its pervasive themes of honor, nobility, magic, intrigue, duty, and warfare _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; should carry over from the original L5R CCG, Legend of the Five Rings: The Card Game is not compatible with that original game and will feature significant changes in the game mechanisms._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Brand New and in Shrink. This if for a Standard 54 Playing Cards Deck of the most stunning character art from the Legend of the Five Rings.
Opened, played half a game. Not for us. Shipping will be $12

3x Core set. Opened, almost unused. Played a couple games, but it just isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t for me. I didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t keep the boxes, but I will ship with the sleeves I used (3 decks fully sleeved). One set of tokens are unpunched, the other 2 still in shrink. Will likely transfer into long boxes, shipping with binders can be dangerous. If you want, I can include the binder, I will just take the cards out so they don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t risk getting wrecked. Shipping is free in Canada, add $5 for USA. (I basically included shipping in the price, it just costs about $5 more to ship to the states. Please note currency is in USD, despite me living in Canada.
I purchased this to supplement my other base set and decided it was not the game for me, box is opened, but not played. 5$ shipping.

SAVINGS OF $75.00 Selling because game is too heavy for my partner. Played a total of 5 times. Contents: - Core sets x 3 - All Dynasty packs from the Imperial Cycle (6) - Tears of Amaterasu, For Honor and Glory, Into the Forbidden City, Chrysanthemum Throne, Fate Has No Secrets, Meditations on the Ephemeral - 1 game box with components from all 3 core boxes Will also include: - Binder which currently holds all the cards - 1 deck box with extra slot on top to hold components for travel - 80 sleeves (40 blue back, 40 red back) for organized play purposes Current online retail prices for core sets and expansions are: - Core sets (x3): 42.49 x3 = C$127.47 - Expansions (x6): 16.14 x6 = C$96.84 - Total = 127.47+96.84 = C$224.31+tax Please contact me if seriously considering and I can send you pictures of everything. Will also consider best offers.

This listing is for a Fantasy Flight Games Legend of the Five Rings collection. The game has been played once and the cards were sleeved. Only one core set was used. The rest of the cards were I played. Sleeves are not included. Cards will be shipped in white card boxes. I do not have the game boxes any more. The white boxes will be placed in another box for shipping. All rulebooks, tokens, etc are included. Listing includes: 3 x Core Sets Tears of Amaterasu For Honor and Glory Into the Forbidden City The Chrysanthemum Throne Fate has no Secrets Meditations on the Ephemeral I will ship via USPS Priority Mail so shipping is $14
